plot: In the South American jungle supplies of nitroglycerene are needed at a remote oil field. The oil company pays four men to deliver the supplies in two trucks. A tense rivallry develops between the two sets of drivers and on the rough remote roads the slightest jolt can result in death.   Written by  Col Needham
title: El salario del miedo

lists.title: Ganadoras de la Palma de Oro de Cannes
